summary: State and local governments or other transportation authorities who want project funding from the Department of Transportation used to face long journeys through multiple programs and offices. A 2015 law sought to create a one-stop shop for applicants. It required DOT to consolidate key programs into one bureau—the Build America Bureau—and simplify the application process. We found that the bureau has tried to streamline its...
title: Surface Transportation: Action Needed to Guide Implementation of Build America Bureau and Improve Application Process
